response.original_title: Joel Shapiro: An Artist at Work
response.overview: This film features “Conjunction,” a large-scale bronze sculpture by American artist Joel Shapiro (b. 1941), which was commissioned by FAPE in 1998 and installed at the U.S. Embassy in Ottawa, Canada the following year. The Shapiro sculpture was FAPE’s first site-specific project.
response.title: Joel Shapiro: An Artist at Work
